Posts.Content: Imsevenyearsout wrote: Just droping by to say that today I am 7 years out. I was dxed in 2005, IDC stage 2 er+/pr+/her2neu+.  Did 4 A/C, 12 weekly taxol, with herceptin than herceptin, every 3 weeks for a year, and 36 rads. Life is wonderful.  Scans last year, still dancing with Ned. I wish you all well. Randi AKA SnufflesMom Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Hope for You All Imsevenyearsout Janie-bug
